author: VNExplorer
title: Cae alias Limones, presunto cabecilla del ELN en Cali: lo acusan de ser el mayor reclutador de menores en Valle del Cauca
text: Por información de inteligencia militar lograron la captura de un supuesto cabecilla del ELN en la ciudad de Cali, así lo dio a conocer este miércoles 14 de agosto, el Ejército Nacional por medio de la Tercera Brigada. Se trata de Manuel Fernando Álvarez Hernández, alias Limones, contra quien había una orden de captura por los delitos de reclutamiento forzado de menores y población vulnerable. Según las labores de inteligencia, este sujeto sería cabecilla del Frente de Guerra Suroccidental del ELN y residía en el barrio El Poblado I, de Cali, Valle del Cauca. “El capturado tendría injerencia delictiva en sectores de Cali y Popayán, realizando actividades de cobro de extorsiones, reclutamiento forzado de menores y de población venezolana, así como de desplazamientos en el municipio de Guapi, en el Cauca”, dijeron las autoridades. Alias Limones sería instructor de grupos especiales dentro del ELN y francotirador. En 2018 fue capturado y sindicado por el delito de homicidios selectivos y hurto, y quedó en libertad en el año 2020. Ese mismo año, según el Ejército Nacional, retomó las actividades delictivas de reclutamiento, coordinando con integrantes de la Red de Milicias Urbanas, ubicado en los municipios de Puerto Tejada y Popayán, en Cauca, y en Cali, Valle del Cauca. Mientras que en el año 2022 lideró confrontaciones con el grupo Rafael Aguilera, del Comando Coordinador de Occidente, en zona rural de Guapi, y se le acusa de homicidios selectivos en el perímetro urbano de este municipio caucano. Los secuestrados estarían en poder del ELN. Crimen en Cali Luego de un fin de semana violento, con nueve casos de homicidio, Cali se levantó este miércoles con un macabro hallazgo en el oriente de la ciudad, donde la comunidad reportó un cuerpo desmembrado en el sector de El Valladito. Por ahora, las autoridades no se han pronunciado sobre este hecho y no se conoce la identidad de la víctima. Foto de referencia. Tan solo hace un mes, un hecho similar se registró en la capital del Valle con el hallazgo de una cabeza humana en el barrio Alfonso López. De acuerdo con la información preliminar, se trataría de una cabeza que estaba dentro de un costal. “Este caso está en desarrollo, se encuentra, al parecer, en una bolsa, partes de un hombre. Estamos adelantando las labores para determinar en que circunstancias se desarrollaron los hechos”, detalló el coronel Carlos Oviedo, comandante de la Policía Metropolitana de Cali. En la noche del pasado sábado, 29 de junio, otro cadáver también fue encontrado dentro de una bolsa en la Calle 13 con Carrera 16, muy cerca del colegio Antonio José Camacho, en el centro de Cali. Estos hallazgos se registran en medio de una presunta amenaza de presencia de las disidencias de las Farc en la capital del Valle. La Personería de Cali ha documentado varias denuncias que dan cuenta de posibles células de esta estructura criminal en varias comunas de la ciudad. Allí, buscan reclutar adolescentes y jóvenes, y además quedarse con el control criminal del microtráfico, así como la expansión de sus redes de extorsión a gran escala. Se ha reconocido desde las Fuerzas Militares y la Policía que hay disidencias urbanas en Cali.

author: sina_mobile
title: 沙尘笼罩青海格尔木能见度仅数米_手机新浪网
text:
沙尘笼罩青海格尔木能见度仅数米
转自：新京报我们视频
【#沙尘笼罩青海格尔木能见度仅数米#】#青海局地出现大风强沙尘暴天气# 5月7日，甘肃、青海部分地区出现大风、强沙尘暴天气，青海格尔木沙尘暴形成沙墙缓慢推进，天空逐步呈现出红褐色，街道里的能见度逐步降低，车辆打开应急灯后缓慢通行。格尔木市市民岳先生说，前后半个多小时，天气就发生了明显的变化，出现沙尘后自己呛得不行，能见度也就几米。7日，甘肃敦煌月牙泉景区因大风沙尘持续，景区暂停开放。8日20时至9日20时，甘肃省局地仍有4至5级风，并伴有浮尘天气。（记者：马骏 制作：王子轩）

author: Letícia Guedes
title: Previsão do tempo: Finados e Enem serão marcados por chuva no Distrito Federal
text: O primeiro dia do mês de novembro amanheceu cinza, mais uma vez, na capital. Segundo o Instituto Nacional de Meteorologia (Inmet), o céu deve permanecer nublado nos próximos dias. O Distrito Federal está sob alerta amarelo para chuvas intensas. Apesar disso, a previsão é de que as precipitações variem de fracas a moderadas nesta sexta-feira (1/11). A temperatura mínima registrada nesta manhã foi de 17°C e, à tarde, a máxima deve atingir os 27°C. A umidade deve variar entre 95% e 45%. Leia também: Auditoria do TCDF aponta falhas de segurança e estrutura em escolas públicas Quem tem programação ao ar livre para este sábado (2/11), quando é celebrado o Dia de Finados, ou fará a prova do Exame Nacional do Ensino Médio (Enem) no domingo (3/11), deve ficar atento e levar o guarda-chuva. De acordo com o Inmet, a tendência é que o tempo permaneça semelhante nos próximos dias. Leia também: Polícia desmantela facção de Planaltina e prende 14 criminosos O alerta amarelo para chuvas intensas permanecerá até segunda-feira (4/11), às 10h. Embora haja o aviso, de baixo risco de corte de energia elétrica, queda de galhos de árvores , alagamentos e de descargas elétricas. Siga o canal do Correio no WhatsApp e receba as principais notícias do dia no seu celular Fortes ventos não são esperados para esta sexta e nem para o fim de semana. O instituto informou que a falta de calor intenso atrapalha a formação das nuvens que provocam as rajadas de ventos. Para este fim de semana a velocidade máxima da ventania será de 40 Km.

author: Urlaub-Winter-Sonne
title: Discover the Top Sunny Winter Months Travel Locations That Assurance Sunlight
text:
The calm charm of winter, with its carefully dropping snow and the cheery ambiance, might not be every person's favorite. For those who long for heat and abundant sunshine, loading those bags for a winter months sun holiday may be the utmost option. Keep analysis as we reveal leading vacation places that guarantee sunlight during winter months. Discover the bliss of enjoying a sun-drenched holiday while your home town is tucked under a covering of snow.
Escape to Exotic Heavens in Winter Season
When you think of sun-soaked winter season holidays is unique coastline places, the very first kind of location that possibly crosses your mind. Honored with exotic climate, locations like the Caribbean Islands, Hawaii, and Thailand brag intense, bright days also in winter months. These locations are a success for their magnificent blue-green waters, white sandy coastlines, and a myriad of water sporting activities. Swim in cozy sea waters, attempt surfboarding, or just kick back on the beach taking in the sunshine. You can rely on these exotic hideaways to run away the winter months blues and appreciate year-round bright weather condition.
Varied Deserts Awaiting Your Wintertime Check Out
If you're even more of an adventurer and want something different from coastline journeys, desert locations produce a special winter season getaway. The Atacama Desert in Chile, the Sahara Desert in North Africa, and Phoenix Az, Arizona in the US offer assured sunlight in wintertime. Discover unlimited adventure in the middle of the dunes as you take pleasure in a warm winter season getaway like never ever previously. Delight in the snow-free skies and cozy temperature levels as you check out the grandeur of these spiritual landscapes. Stroll around on a camel, feeling the adventure of moving down huge sand dunes, and appreciate the plain beauty of these substantial surfaces bathed in sunshine.
Discover Cozy City Breaks in Winter Season
A much less checked out concept is investing wintertime sun vacations in warm and vibrant cities. Cities like Miami in the US and Sydney in Australia are amongst minority that enjoy cozy weather throughout winter season. These metropolises emit energy and positivity, and many thanks to their warm environment in wintertime, allow exterior exploration with no limitation. From dynamic markets and renowned spots to dynamic night life and culinary scenes, these cities, brimming with multiculturalism, use a whole brand-new sunny wintertime experience. Comfortable strolling tours, alfresco eating and an entire host of outside occasions are at your disposal.
Picking the best location for a warm wintertime getaway considerably depends on the sort of traveler in you. Be it lounging on a coastline, trudging with desert sands, or exploring a vibrant city, there's a bright winter season location waiting just for you. End the year on a bright note and let it overflow right into the New Year with these winter months sun vacation destinations.
Weiterlesen

author: Morgan Sweeney | The Center Square
title: Study: AI and data centers could drive cost of energy up by 70% over 10 years
text:
(The Center Square) — The average American’s energy bill could increase from 25% to 70% in the next 10 years without intervention from policymakers, according to a new study from Washington, D.C.-based think tank the Jack Kemp Foundation.
According to reports, America is facing an energy crisis, with demand for energy soaring due to the proliferation of AI and hyperscale data centers – which can use as much energy as almost 40,000 homes – the boom in advanced manufacturing, and the movement toward electrification.

author: PTI
title: Dense fog engulfs parts of Kashmir, hits flight operations at Srinagar airport
text: Gulmarg, a tourist resort town known for skiing activities in north Kashmir, recorded a low of minus 4.5 degrees Celsius, up from the previous night's minus 8.6 degrees, the Met office said.

author: Get News
title: Care Right There Remains Committed to Offering Top-Tier Elderly Care in Glassboro, NJ | User | mammothtimes.com
text:
Care Right There in Glassboro, NJ, reaffirms its commitment to providing top-tier elderly care. Known for exceptional services, it offers personalized care plans ensuring seniors' independence and comfort at home. Trust and compassion are at the heart of their mission, making them a trusted leader in home care. Discover more about their dedicated services at https://carerightthere.com. Glassboro, NJ - Care Right There, a prominent provider of elderly care services, today announced its continued dedication to delivering unparalleled home care solutions to the seniors of Glassboro, NJ. Recognized for its exceptional services and as one of the leading home care agencies in Glassboro, NJ, Care Right There is reaffirming its commitment to the community, ensuring that residents have access to the high-quality care they deserve.
"Care Right There has always been at the forefront of providing superior elderly care in Glassboro, NJ. Our goal is to enhance the lives of our seniors, allowing them to maintain their independence and comfort in their homes. We understand the significance of trust and compassion in our care, and our team of professional caregivers is devoted to upholding these values daily," said Marisa A Betancourt, owner of Care Right There.
In response to the growing need for dependable elderly care in Glassboro, Care Right There offers a wide range of personalized services designed to meet the diverse needs of its clients. From daily living assistance to specialized care plans, the agency is dedicated to ensuring the well-being and satisfaction of the seniors it serves. This commitment underscores the importance of accessible, quality home care solutions that support families caring for their aging loved ones.
With the demand for elderly care services rising, Care Right There's steadfast dedication to meeting this demand reflects its deep-rooted commitment to the community of Glassboro, NJ. By continuously striving to provide top-notch care, Care Right There meets and exceeds the expectations of those it serves, solidifying its position as a trusted leader in the home care industry.
For more information about Care Right There and their elderly care in Glassboro, NJ , please visit their website at https://carerightthere.com
About Care Right There Home Care:
Care Right There is a leading provider of elderly care services in Glassboro, NJ. Known for its comprehensive care solutions and a team of dedicated caregivers, Care Right There prides itself on its ability to offer personalized, compassionate care that prioritizes the health and happiness of its clients. As one of the best home care agencies in Glassboro, NJ, Care Right There is committed to enhancing the lives of the elderly in the community, ensuring they receive the respect, dignity, and quality of care they deserve.
